mapper.select: SELECT c.coursecode, c.categorycode, c.cousreName, c.cousreprice, c.cousreteacher, c.cousreTerm, c.cousreImg, c.cousreterm-(sysdate-co.ORDERDATE) as leftDay_s FROM course c JOIN courseorder co ON c.coursecode = co.coursecode WHERE co.userid = #{userId} AND (sysdate - co.ORDERDATE) < c.cousreterm
